RelatedSentence: Johnson Controls of suburban Milwaukee signed a merger agreement Sunday with Yanfeng Automotive Trim Systems of Shanghai .
Yanfeng will have a 70 percent share of the new company -- which will make instrument and door panels and a host of other vehicle interior components .
